variables.input: fetch bizevents | filter event.kind == "BIZ_EVENT" | filter json.companyName == "Manufacturing" | fields json.companyName | dedup json.companyName

fetch bizevents 
| filter json.companyName == $CompanyName
| fields json.industryType | dedup json.industryType
fetch bizevents | filter event.kind == "BIZ_EVENT" | filter in(json.industryType, $JourneyType) | filter json.companyName == "Manufacturing" | fields json.stepName | dedup json.stepName

fetch bizevents
| fields json.serviceName, json.companyName, json.industryType
| summarize count(),by:{json.companyName, json.industryType, json.serviceName}
| filter json.companyName == $CompanyName 
| filter in(json.industryType, $JourneyType)
| dedup json.serviceName
| fields json.serviceName = lower(json.serviceName)
| filter isNotNull(json.serviceName)
//| filter isNotNull(json.serviceName)

smartscapeNodes PROCESS
| lookup [smartscapeNodes SERVICE | fields id, name], sourceField:name, lookupField:name, prefix:"svc."
| lookup [timeseries cpu = avg(dt.process.cpu.usage), by:{dt.smartscape.process}], sourceField:id, lookupField:dt.smartscape.process, fields:{cpu}
| filter isNotNull(cpu)
//| fields dt.smartscape.process = id, name, cpu
| fieldsAdd LowerService = lower(process.metadata[DYNATRACE_CLUSTER_ID])
| filter in(LowerService, $Service)
| fields id
| dedup id

0.content:
# Manufacturing
## Upgrade Project - Business Observability Dashboard

**Industry:** Upgrade Project | **Dashboard Type:** AI-Generated Bespoke Analytics
**Data Signals Detected:** ðŸ”§ Services

1.content:
## ðŸ”„ Customer Journey Flow

**1. AssessmentWorkshop** (Discovery) **â†’** **2. SolutionDesign** (Design) **â†’** **3. ContractNegotiation** (Commercial) **â†’** **4. ProjectKickoff** (Project Management) **â†’** **5. FactoryAcceptanceTesting** (Quality Assurance) **â†’** **6. SiteInstallation** (Installation) **â†’** **7. SystemCommissioning** (Commissioning)

---
*End-to-end journey visualization with step-by-step metrics*

2.title: ðŸ“Š Journey Step Metrics
2.query:
fetch bizevents 
| filter event.kind == "BIZ_EVENT" 
| filter json.companyName == $CompanyName 
| filter json.industryType == $JourneyType 
| summarize 
    OrdersInStep = count(), 
    SuccessRate = round((toDouble(countIf(isNull(additionalfields.hasError) or additionalfields.hasError == false)) / toDouble(count())) * 100, decimals:2),
    AvgTimeInStep = avg(additionalfields.processingTime),
    ErrorsInStep = countIf(additionalfields.hasError == true),
    ErrorRate = round((toDouble(countIf(additionalfields.hasError == true)) / toDouble(count())) * 100, decimals:2), 
    by: {json.stepName} 
| sort OrdersInStep desc

3.query: data record(a="Overall Journey Performance - All Steps")

4.title: ðŸ“ˆ Total Journey Volume
4.query: fetch bizevents | filter event.kind == "BIZ_EVENT" | filter json.companyName == $CompanyName | filter json.industryType == $JourneyType | summarize TotalEvents = count()

5.title: âœ… Journey Success Rate
5.query:
fetch bizevents 
| filter event.kind == "BIZ_EVENT" 
| filter json.companyName == $CompanyName 
| filter json.industryType == $JourneyType 
| summarize total = count(), successful = countIf(isNull(additionalfields.hasError) or additionalfields.hasError == false) 
| fieldsAdd success_rate = round((toDouble(successful) / toDouble(total)) * 100, decimals:2)

6.title: ðŸ’° Total Revenue
6.query: fetch bizevents | filter event.kind == "BIZ_EVENT" | filter json.companyName == $CompanyName | filter json.industryType == $JourneyType or $JourneyType == "*" | summarize revenue = sum(additionalfields.orderTotal)

7.title: âŒ Total Errors
7.query: fetch bizevents | filter event.kind == "BIZ_EVENT" | filter json.companyName == $CompanyName | filter json.industryType == $JourneyType or $JourneyType == "*" | summarize errors = countIf(additionalfields.hasError == true)

8.title: ðŸ“ˆ Volume Over Time
8.query: fetch bizevents | filter event.kind == "BIZ_EVENT" | filter json.companyName == $CompanyName | filter json.industryType == $JourneyType | makeTimeseries successful = countIf(isNull(additionalfields.hasError) or additionalfields.hasError == false), failed = countIf(additionalfields.hasError == true), bins:30

9.title: ðŸ“Š Events by Step
9.query: fetch bizevents | filter event.kind == "BIZ_EVENT" | filter json.companyName == "Manufacturing" | filter json.industryType == $JourneyType or $JourneyType == "*" | summarize count = count(), by: {json.stepName} | sort count desc | limit 10

10.query: data record(a="Filtered View - By Selected Step")

11.title: ðŸ’¼ Journey Events (Filtered)
11.query: fetch bizevents | filter event.kind == "BIZ_EVENT" | filter json.companyName == "Manufacturing" | filter json.industryType == $JourneyType or $JourneyType == "*" | filter in(json.stepName, $Step) | summarize total = count()

12.title: ðŸ’° Revenue (Filtered)
12.query: fetch bizevents | filter event.kind == "BIZ_EVENT" | filter json.companyName == "Manufacturing" | filter json.industryType == $JourneyType or $JourneyType == "*" | filter in(json.stepName, $Step) | summarize revenue = sum(additionalfields.orderTotal)

13.title: ðŸ’µ Avg Order Value
13.query: fetch bizevents | filter event.kind == "BIZ_EVENT" | filter json.companyName == "Manufacturing" | filter json.industryType == $JourneyType or $JourneyType == "*" | filter in(json.stepName, $Step) | summarize avg = avg(additionalfields.orderTotal)

14.title: â±ï¸ P90 Response Time
14.query: fetch bizevents | filter event.kind == "BIZ_EVENT" | filter json.companyName == "Manufacturing" | filter json.industryType == $JourneyType or $JourneyType == "*" | filter in(json.stepName, $Step) | summarize p90 = percentile(additionalfields.processingTime, 90)

15.title: ðŸ“ˆ Events Over Time (Filtered)
15.query: fetch bizevents | filter event.kind == "BIZ_EVENT" | filter json.companyName == "Manufacturing" | filter json.industryType == $JourneyType or $JourneyType == "*" | filter in(json.stepName, $Step) | makeTimeseries events = count(), bins:30

16.title: ðŸ“Š Events by Step (Filtered)
16.query: fetch bizevents | filter event.kind == "BIZ_EVENT" | filter json.companyName == $CompanyName | filter json.industryType == $JourneyType or $JourneyType == "*" | summarize count = count(), by: {json.stepName} | sort count desc | limit 10

18.title: âš¡ Step Performance
18.query:
fetch bizevents 
| filter event.kind == "BIZ_EVENT" 
| filter json.companyName == $CompanyName 
| filter json.industryType == $JourneyType 
| summarize Events = count(), AvgTime = avg(additionalfields.processingTime), ErrorRate = round((toDouble(countIf(additionalfields.hasError == true)) / toDouble(count())) * 100, decimals:2), by: {json.stepName} 
| sort Events desc

19.title: ðŸ“‹ SLA Compliance (< 5s)
19.query: fetch bizevents | filter event.kind == "BIZ_EVENT" | filter json.companyName == $CompanyName | filter json.industryType == $JourneyType | summarize TotalEvents = count(), WithinSLA = countIf(additionalfields.processingTime < 5000), by: {json.stepName} | fieldsAdd ComplianceRate = (WithinSLA / TotalEvents) * 100

20.title: ðŸ“‰ Error Rate Trend
20.query: fetch bizevents | filter event.kind == "BIZ_EVENT" | filter json.companyName == $CompanyName | filter json.industryType == $JourneyType | makeTimeseries {errors = countIf(additionalfields.hasError == true), total = count()}, bins:30 | fieldsAdd ErrorRate = (errors[] / total[]) * 100

21.title: âŒ Errors by Step
21.query: fetch bizevents | filter event.kind == "BIZ_EVENT" | filter json.companyName == $CompanyName | filter json.industryType == $JourneyType | filter additionalfields.hasError == true | summarize ErrorCount = count(), by: {json.stepName} | sort ErrorCount desc

22.title: ðŸ› Error Details
22.query: fetch bizevents | filter event.kind == "BIZ_EVENT" | filter json.companyName == $CompanyName | filter json.industryType == $JourneyType | filter additionalfields.hasError == true | summarize Occurrences = count(), by: {json.stepName, additionalfields.errorMessage} | sort Occurrences desc | limit 20

23.title: ðŸ• Hourly Activity Pattern
23.query: fetch bizevents | filter event.kind == "BIZ_EVENT" | filter json.companyName == $CompanyName | filter json.industryType == $JourneyType | fieldsAdd hour = toString(getHour(timestamp)) | summarize Events = count(), by: {hour} | sort hour asc

25.title: Requests
25.query:
timeseries requests = sum(dt.service.request.count),
           by:{dt.entity.service}
           | fields  timeframe, 
          interval, 
          service = entityName(dt.entity.service),
          requests
| sort arraySum(requests) desc
| filter in(service, $Service)
| limit 100

28.title: ðŸ’¥ Top Exceptions
28.query:
fetch dt.davis.events, from:now()-24h
| filter event.kind == "ERROR_EVENT"
| summarize occurrences = count(), lastSeen = takeLast(timestamp), by: {event.name, dt.entity.service}
| fieldsAdd serviceName = entityName(dt.entity.service)
| sort occurrences desc
| limit 15

33.title: ðŸš¨ Active Davis Problems
33.query:
fetch dt.davis.problems
| filter event.status == "ACTIVE"
| fields display_id, title, affected_entity_ids, event.start, event.status, management_zone
| sort event.start desc
| limit 10

34.title: ðŸ“‹ Recent Log Errors
34.query:
fetch logs, from:now()-1h
| filter loglevel == "ERROR" or loglevel == "WARN"
| fields timestamp, loglevel, content, dt.entity.service
| fieldsAdd serviceName = entityName(dt.entity.service)
| sort timestamp desc
| limit 20

35.title: ðŸ”— Quick Navigation

36.content: *Dashboard auto-generated by BizObs Engine* | Monitoring Manufacturing journey performance across all touchpoints

39.title: ðŸ’¥ TRACES WITH EXCEPTIONS: Click on Endpoint to open Trace. Or use Open-With Davis CoPilot to explain Exception
39.query:
fetch spans
| filter in(dt.entity.service, array($Service))

| fieldsAdd Service = rpc.service
| fieldsAdd exception.stacktrace = span.events[][exception.stack_trace]
| fieldsAdd exception.class = span.events[0][exception.type]
| fieldsAdd eventname = span.events[0][span_event.name]
| fieldsAdd exception.message = toString(span.events[][exception.message])
| fieldsAdd trace_id = toString(trace.id), span_id = toString(span.id)

| filter eventname == "exception"
| filter isNotNull(span.exit_by_exception_id)

| fields Time = start_time,
         start_time,
         end_time,
         Service,
         Endpoint = concat("[", if(isnull(endpoint.name), span.name, else: endpoint.name), "](/ui/apps/dynatrace.distributedtracing/explorer?cv=a%2Cfalse\u0026sidebar=a%2Cfalse\u0026filter=dt.entity.service+%3D+",dt.entity.service,"+AND+endpoint.name+%3D+",endpoint.name,"+AND+trace.id+%3D+",
                         trace_id,"\u0026traceId=",trace_id,"\u0026spanId=",span_id,"\u0026tf=",$dt_timeframe_from,";",$dt_timeframe_to,"\u0026pb=true","\u0026tt=",encodeUrl(toString(start_time)),")"),
         ExceptionClass = if(isNotNull(exception.class),exception.class, else:"N/A"),
         ExceptionMesssage = concat("ðŸ¤– ", if(isNotNull(exception.message),exception.message, else:"N/A")),
         Exception = if(isNotNull(exception.stacktrace),exception.stacktrace, else:"N/A"),
         Duration = duration,
         dt.entity.service, 
         trace.id,
         span.id     
| sort start_time desc
| limit 200
| fieldsAdd prompt=concat("Analyze the Exception, Service and Endpoint and tell me how to fix the exception ", `ExceptionClass`, ":", ExceptionMesssage), execute=true, contexts=array(record(type="supplementary", value=substring(concat(`Exception`, " Service", `Endpoint`), to:20000)))

43.title: Latency_p50
43.query:
timeseries latency_p50 = median(dt.service.request.response_time),
           by:{dt.entity.service}
           | fields  timeframe, 
          interval, 
          service = entityName(dt.entity.service),
          latency_p50
| sort arrayAvg(latency_p50) desc
| filter in(service, $Service)
| limit 100

44.title: Failed Requests
44.query:
timeseries errors = sum(dt.service.request.failure_count,default:0),
           nonempty: true,
           by:{dt.entity.service}
           | fields  timeframe, 
          interval, 
          service = entityName(dt.entity.service),
          errors
| sort arraySum(errors) desc
| filter in(service, $Service)
| limit 100

45.title: CPU Usage %

47.title: Requests - Success vs Failed
47.query:
timeseries total = sum(dt.service.request.count, default:0),
           failed = sum(dt.service.request.failure_count,default:0),
           nonempty: true, 
           filter: in(dt.smartscape.service, array($Service)) 
| fieldsAdd success = total[] -failed[]
| fields timeframe,
         interval,
         success,
         failed

48.title: Latency_p90
48.query:
timeseries latency_p90 = percentile(dt.service.request.response_time, 90),
           by:{dt.entity.service}
          | fields  timeframe, 
          interval, 
          service = lower(entityName(dt.entity.service)),
          latency_p90
| sort arrayAvg(latency_p90) desc
| filter in(service, $Service)
| limit 100

49.title: 5xx Errors
49.query:
timeseries errors = sum(dt.service.request.count,default:0),
           nonempty: true,
           by:{dt.entity.service},
           filter:
           http.response.status_code >= 500 and http.response.status_code <= 599 
| fields  timeframe, 
          interval, 
          service = lower(entityName(dt.entity.service)),
          errors
| sort arraySum(errors) desc
| filter in(service, array($Service))
| limit 100

50.title: Memory Used

51.title: Requests - Key Requests
51.query:
timeseries requests = sum(dt.service.request.count),
           by:{endpoint.name},
           filter: endpoint.name != "NON_KEY_REQUESTS" and
           in(dt.entity.service, array($Service))
| fields  timeframe, 
          interval, 
          endpoint.name,
          requests
| sort arraySum(requests) desc         
| limit 100

52.title: Latency_p99
52.query:
timeseries latency_p99 = percentile(dt.service.request.response_time, 99), 
           by:{dt.entity.service}
| fields  timeframe, 
          interval, 
          service = lower(entityName(dt.entity.service)),
          latency_p99
| sort arrayAvg(latency_p99) desc
| filter in(service, array($Service))
| limit 100

53.title: 4xx Errors
53.query:
timeseries errors = sum(dt.service.request.count,default:0),
           nonempty: true,
           by:{dt.entity.service},
           filter:
           http.response.status_code >= 400 and http.response.status_code <= 499
| fields  timeframe, 
          interval, 
          service = lower(entityName(dt.entity.service)),
          errors
|filter in(service, array($Service))
| sort arraySum(errors) desc
| limit 100

54.title: 4xx Errors
54.query:
timeseries gc_time = avg(dt.runtime.jvm.gc.suspension_time),
           by:{dt.smartscape.process},
           filter: in(dt.smartscape.process, array($PGI))       
| append [timeseries gc_time = avg(dt.runtime.clr.gc.suspension_time),
           by:{dt.smartscape.process},
           filter: in(dt.smartscape.process, array($PGI))
         ]
| append [timeseries gc_time = avg(dt.runtime.go.gc.suspension_time),
           by:{dt.smartscape.process},
           filter: in(dt.smartscape.process, array($PGI)) 
         ]
| append [timeseries gc_time = avg(dt.runtime.nodejs.gc.suspension_time),
           by:{dt.smartscape.process},
           filter: in(dt.smartscape.process, array($PGI))
         ]
| lookup [smartscapeNodes PROCESS | fields id, name], sourceField:dt.smartscape.process, lookupField:id, fields:{name}
| fields timeframe, interval, process = name, gc_time
| sort arrayAvg(gc_time) desc
| limit 100
